Please provide the planned task information. I'll summarize it into the required format and return it as JSON.

Format: task:description

Example: "Task 1: Description"

Waiting for your input...

Please provide your reflections of the day in a text format, and I'll summarize it for you in the desired format.

(Note: I'll split the task into multiple cells and order them in chronological order. I'll return the result in JSON format.)

Go ahead and share your reflections!
